page.title: 14THE PARK IN GORDON.
page.content: The park is situated near the crossroads on the Kelso road.You drive up to the gates and you park on the grass.There aren't any new facilties coming to the park. There are swings and a shoot, tennis and a bowling club.You can hire bowls for a day.You cannot hire tennis equipment. There might be a new park going to be built behind the school field.This is a better place for at the moment children have to cross the main road. A councillor says that there might be a football pitch going to be built.We have been down to the park three different days doing a survey. No one came, we think this is because it is badly situated.
